Method Detail

add

public static Measurement add(Measurement meas1,
                              Measurement meas2)
Add two measurements, taking their units and uncertainty into consideration.

Returns:
a new measurement equal to op1+op2, or null if the operation is illegal or impossible.

sub

public static Measurement sub(Measurement meas1,
                              Measurement meas2)
Subtract two measurements, taking units and uncertainty into consideration.

Returns:
op1-op2, or null if the operation is illegal or either measurement is ill-formed

mult

public static Measurement mult(Measurement meas1,
                               double c)
Multiply a measurement by a constant.

Parameters:
meas1 - The measurement
c - The constant
Returns:
a new measurement equal to meas × c, or null if the operation is illegal or the measurement is ill-formed

div

public static Measurement div(Measurement meas1,
                              double c)
Divide a measurement by a constant.

Parameters:
meas1 - The measurement
c - The constant
Returns:
a new measurement equal to meas/c, or null if the operation is illegal or the measurement is ill-formed

mult

public static Measurement mult(Measurement meas1,
                               Measurement meas2)
Multiply two measurements, taking units and uncertainty into consideration.

Returns:
op1-op2, or null if the operation is illegal or either measurement is ill-formed

div

public static Measurement div(Measurement meas1,
                              Measurement meas2)
Divide two measurements, taking units and uncertainty into consideration.

Returns:
op1/op2, or null if the operation is illegal or either measurement is ill-formed

raise

public static Measurement raise(Measurement meas,
                                int exp)
Raise a measurement to a power, taking units and uncertainty into consideration.

Parameters:
meas - the measurement
exp - the power
Returns:
measexp, or null if the operation is illegal or either measurement is ill-formed.

convert

public static Measurement convert(Measurement meas,
                                  Unit u)
Return a new Measurement in which the value is expressed in the given units. Note that a new measurement is always created (so the caller can always treat the result as a copy).

Parameters:
meas - The old measurement
u - The target unit
Returns:
A new measurement. Null if either parameter is null, or meas can't be converted to u.
